answerText: Philip Roth[10] This author of The Wapshot Chronicle taught at the workshop in 1973.  Neddy Merrill crosses America by means of swimming pools in his story "The Swimmer."
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Northwestern A | 8 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: .Identify some authors who taught at the Iowa Writers' Workshop, for 10 points each. [10] This Jewish novelist taught at Iowa in the early 1960's, before he achieved fame for works like Portnoy's Complaint and The Human Stain.
